author: terence0083
content:

```
Error: could not apply tx 10 [0x9fc79b663ec886bcb6f873bf86e57336fce715b5b17c068c3d468a8dec3419b0]: invalid transaction v, r, s values
```

author: m.kalinin
content: It is actually exposes a subset of `eth` methods, if you want `web3_` to be in the list you may submit a PR

author: parithosh
content: Deprecation notice for MSF12! It'll be deleted later today. We will have MSF13 and Goerli for testing. MSF13 will merge tomorrow.

author: ryanleeschneider
content: Is optimistic sync the mechanism that all EL/CL pairs currently use to sync a new node, or is there another spec I should be looking at for _current_ behavior? https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/blob/dev/sync/optimistic.md

author: ryanleeschneider
content: ^ what I'm particularly looking for is something that explains the initial handshake when a EL/CL pair starts up after e.g. being offline for some period of time, how the two determine what to do next over the engine API
